title: "Elon Musk says DeepMind is his 'top concern' when it comes to A.I."
excerpt: "Elon Musk believes that DeepMind is a \"top concern\" when it comes to artificial intelligence.  The Tesla and SpaceX boss made his comments in an interview with The New York Times.  Musk invested in DeepMind before it was acquired by Google in 2014."
